name: jayy dodd
bio: jayy dodd is a digital art worker and queer nightlife fixture from Los Angeles, now based in Portland. She is the author of three poetry collections, including Impressive Woman (Nightboat Books, forthcoming 2021), The Black Condition ft. Narcissus (Nightboat Books, 2019), and Mannish Tongues (Platypus Press, 2017), and the chapbook [sugar in the tank] (Pizza Pi Press, 2016).
